item.title: JD's Catering Services Limited
item.description:
About Us

JD’s Catering Services Limited offers exceptional catering services for all occasions, ensuring a memorable dining experience tailored to your event. With a focus on quality ingredients and personalized menus, we cater to both small gatherings and large celebrations.

Our Services

  • Event Catering: Professional catering for all occasions
  • Custom Menus: Personalized menu planning
  • Special Events: Comprehensive catering solutions

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Jason Daniel
  • Phone: 724-7804
  • Email: jdscatering@hotmail.com
